Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind Tuesday, February 14, 2012 7PM

A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

Nicole Dudukovic, Assistant Professor of Psychology at Trinity College, is fascinated by the ways in which our memories shape who we are, providing us with our personal identities and giving meaning to the world around us. Dudukovic's most recent research explores the mechanics of memory.

 

Science on Screen creatively pairs area scientists with entertaining films.   For more information about the series, go to:  http://www.realartways.org/science-on-screen.html
